thread.title: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Model Amber Davis Leads Today’s Star Sightings
thread.title_full: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Model Amber Davis Leads Today’s Star Sightings

author: Celebuzz
title: Scott Disick Getting Cozy with Model Amber Davis Leads Today’s Star Sightings
text:
MORE >> 
Scott Disick isn’t ready to slow down with the PDA just yet. 
Days after he was photographed canoodling poolside with model Amber Davis in Miami, the Keeping Up with the Kardashians star was back at it again with the blonde bombshell when he went for a bit to eat on Thursday (Feb. 2, 2017). Joined by a large group of friends, Disick was seen getting handsy Davis as they shared several embraces during the meal. CREDIT: FameFlynet 
According to TMZ , Disick dropped serious cash for his Florida trip. Staying at a $12,500-a-night hotel, the father-of-three reportedly ordered tons food and drink — including Don Julio 1942 — to his suite while partying with a bevy of ladies. 
As we all know, Davis was one of the many women who was spotted getting close with Disick. The two were first spied partying together at the Sundance Film Festival before Disick’s family vacation — and subsequent fight — with the Kardashians. Earlier this week, they reconnected and, well, things certainly heated up since then!
